tazeBayatConcepts.no_ekmek_taze: No, the bread is not fresh.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_ekmek_bayat: No, the bread is not stale.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_elma_taze: No, the apple is not fresh.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_elma_bayat: No, the apple is not rotten.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_muz_taze: No, the banana is not fresh.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_muz_bayat: No, the banana is not stale.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_gul_taze: No, the rose is not fresh.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_gul_solmus: No, the rose is not wilted.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_havuc_taze: No, the carrot is not fresh.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_havuc_bayat: No, the carrot is not stale.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_sut_taze: No, the milk is not fresh.
tazeBayatConcepts.no_sut_bozuk: No, the milk is not spoiled.
